summary:
A simple mod adding an axe for Daedra hunter's everywhere.
Requires no DLC or additional mods.
descriptionHtml:
Thank you for taking a look at this mod. It is my first published mod, and is extremely simple.
Requires elven smithing to craft.

WEAPON STATS
============================================================================================
Base damage: 17
Speed: 1.4
Enchantment: Banish Daedra
All other stats are from a steel war axe.

SMITHING
============================================================================================
Steel Ingots x3
Leather Strips x2
Deathbell x2

To Temper--
Steel Ingot x1
Deathbell x1
author: AbeApocalo
